ru.dz.ccu825

Class CCU825Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.dz.ccu825.CCU825Connection

  • public class CCU825Connection
extends java.lang.Object
    Connection to an instance of CCU825 device. Implements device-specific protocol over the (implemented elsewhere) modbus.

    Conforms to CCU825-SM protocol spec. from 5 September 2014, firmware ver. 01.02. Needs an external modbus io driver to work.

    Author:
    dz

    • Constructor Detail

      • CCU825Connection

        public CCU825Connection(ModBusConnection mc,
                byte[] key)
        Initialize a connection. Does nothing.
        Parameters:
        mc - ModbBus connection implementation, used just for fn23 io
        key - communications encryption key. Contact radsel to get one. Have your device IMEI handy.
        Throws:
        CCU825Exception - Mostly due to communication or protocol errors.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public CCU825ReturnCode connect()
                         throws CCU825Exception
        Connect and do handshake as required by protocol.
        Returns:
        handshake result.
        Throws:
        CCU825Exception - in case of communications error or device malfunction

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Actually just calls underlying ModBus connector disconnect().

      • getSysInfo

        public CCU825SysInfo getSysInfo()
                         throws CCU825ProtocolException
        Does a request
        Returns:
        sysinfo (i/o state etc) at the current moment
        Throws:
        CCU825ProtocolException

      • getDeviceInfo

        public CCU825DeviceInfo getDeviceInfo()
        Access informaion about the device such as IMEI, HW version, etc.
        Returns:
        device info as we got in protocol init transaction

      • setOutState

        public int setOutState(int state,
              int mask)
                throws CCU825ProtocolException
        Does a request to change outputs. Can change a group of outputs at once.
        Parameters:
        state - new state of ouputs, bit per output
        mask - only outputs with 1's in corresponding mask bits are changed
        Returns:
        actual outputs state from device
        Throws:
        CCU825ProtocolException

      • getOutState

        public int getOutState()
                throws CCU825ProtocolException
        Request actual outputs state.
        Returns:
        actual outputs state from device
        Throws:
        CCU825ProtocolException

      • setOutState

        public void setOutState(int nOutBit,
               boolean state)
                 throws CCU825ProtocolException
        Set or reset one output.
        Parameters:
        nOutBit - Output to change, 0-6
        state - new state
        Throws:
        CCU825ProtocolException

      • isEncryptionEnabled

        public boolean isEncryptionEnabled()
        If encryption is currently enabled.
        Returns:
        True if we do encryption.

      • setDataDumpEnabled

        public void setDataDumpEnabled(boolean dataDumpEnabled)
        Dump or not all I/O.
        Parameters:
        dataDumpEnabled - True to enable packet data logging.
